scripts.coverage: node prepare-contract.js --mock true && truffle run coverage --network development
scripts.lint: npm run lint:sol && npm run lint:js
scripts.flatten: node prepare-contract.js && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/FarmingCenterUpgradeableProxy.sol > flatten/FarmingCenterUpgradeableProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/FarmingCenter.sol > flatten/FarmingCenter.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/FarmRewardUpgradeableProxy.sol > flatten/FarmRewardUpgradeableProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/FarmRewardLock.sol > flatten/FarmRewardLock.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakingBankAgentUpgradeableProxy.sol > flatten/StakingBankAgentUpgradeableProxy.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/governance/Timelock.sol > flatten/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/governance/Governor.sol > flatten/Governor.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/LBNB.sol > flatten/LBNB.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SBF.sol > flatten/SBF.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/CommunityTaxVault.sol > flatten/CommunityTaxVault.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakingBankImpl.sol > flatten/StakingBankImpl.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/StakingRewardVault.sol > flatten/StakingRewardVault.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/UnstakeVault.sol > flatten/UnstakeVault.sol
